articles.title: Sundar Pichai says Google One cloud storage service has nearly 100M subscribers - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google CEO Sudar Pichai said that the company's Google One cloud storage service is " just about to cross" 100 million subscribers.
articles.content:
Google CEO Sudar Pichai said that the company’s Google One cloud storage service is ” just about to cross” 100 million subscribers.
